page.title: 01General Information
page.content: Our D block includes the village of Hatfield Peverel which is mainly situated in one square of the twelve on the grid. Much of the rest of the block is used for farmland which in turn is mainly arable farming.Hatfield Peverel is situated about 5 miles North East of Chelmsford and about 15 miles South East of Colchester.The village lies on the London to Colchester Roman road and the village and its surroundings are rich with history.The landscape is very flat in keeping with most parts of Essex. The village has greatly developed in the last ten years or so with the building of the new housing estates, and there are plans for more houses to be built in the village in the next few years. At present the population of the village is 3400. Many of the inhabitants commute to London which
